title: feat: Support free model definition placement

body:
Closes: #964 

Add support for placing model definitions anywhere in the `lib` directory if they use a `*.spy`, `*.spy.yaml` or `*.spy.yml` extension. 

The model files are still generated in the `lib/src/generated` directory, and the subdirectory path for the generated model files will have a base from either of these paths:
- `lib`
- `lib/src`
- `lib/src/protocol`
- `lib/src/models`

This means that a new restriction has been added to prevent file collisions for the generated files. For example if a model file with the same name is placed in `lib/src/protocol` or `lib/src/models/`, this would result in the generated model file having the same name.

## Breaking changes

None - this introduces more locations to place model files with the `spy` extension.
